message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's worth a lot to you, and I'm willing to let it go for $120. It's a one-time offer, so don't miss out!
I'm interested in the product, but $120 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $100.

Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand it's a bit pricey, but I think the product is really valuable. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $110. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product!
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit hesitant. I'm thinking more along the lines of $95. Can you do that for me?

I understand your concerns, Bob, and I'm willing to make a bit more of a concession. I can offer it to you for $105. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really get a lot of value out of the product. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit hesitant. I'm thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you do that for me?

I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob, but I'm still willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $98. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still not convinced. I'm thinking more along the lines of $85. Can you do that for me?

I'm getting close to my limit, Bob, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $92. It's my final offer, and I think it's a great deal. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options.

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still not willing to pay $92. I'm thinking more along the lines of $80. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options.
